bug.author: afranklin
bug.summary: Style transfer: Investigate and fix green/purple diagonal lines
bug.description: Lots of result images get diagonal green/purple lines. Let's try to investigate and fix this, if possible. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/455404/41440811-e447b03a-6fe4-11e8-9e18-5240fe2ead82.jpg></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: hello . this is a big bug. fix ok now?
